data-dictionary.name: adsf
data-dictionary.description: Templates are customizable by user and used to perform management operations

column.name: UI_COMPONENT_ID
column.description: Unique id of each UI Component

table.name: ADSUserDelegatedTemplates
table.description: Default template for a template type for a user is defined.

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique id of each Tray Component

column.name: TEMPLATE_COMPONENT_ID
column.description: Unique id of each Tray Component

column.name: IS_WRAPPER
column.description: if true, by default component will comes with lable,toolTip and other attribs

table.name: ADSTemplateCompDefinition
table.description: Definition for a field tray component

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique id of each field in definition

table.name: ADSTemplateCompMapping
table.description: Layout definition for a group of components(say task)

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique id of each field in definition

column.name: DEFAULT_VALUE_ID
column.description: Unique id of each Field Comp vs Operation Param

column.name: PARAM_NAME
column.description: Used only for UI. This is not required for execution of tasks.

table.name: ADSTemplateCompConstraints
table.description: Unique id of each Field Comp vs Operation Rule

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique id of each Field Comp vs Rule

column.name: TEMPLATE_TAB_ID
column.description: Unique id of each tab in a template

column.name: STYLE_CLASSES
column.description: Any style specific for a tab such as logo,..

column.name: TEMPLATE_TAB_GRP_ID
column.description: Unique id of each group in a tab

column.description: Any style specific for a tab such as logo,..

column.name: FIELD_VALUE_MAP_ID
column.description: Unique id of each tab in a template

column.description: Unique id of each tab in a template

column.name: TAB_ID
column.description: Unique id of each Tray Category

column.name: TAB_GROUP_ID
column.description: Unique id of each Tray Category

table.description: Operation Vs Tray Components Vs Category

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique id of each Operation vs Tray Component

column.description: Unique id of each tab in a template

column.name: STYLE_CLASSES
column.description: Any style specific for a tab such as logo,..

column.name: POLICY_ID
column.description: Policy id.

column.name: MINIMUM_PASSWORD_LENGTH
column.description: Minimum Password Length.

column.name: MAXIMUM_PASSWORD_LENGTH
column.description: Maximum Password Length.

column.name: NO_OF_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS
column.description: Number Of Special Characters.

column.name: NO_OF_NUMERALS
column.description: Number Of Numerals.

column.name: START_WITH_ALPHABET
column.description: Start With An Alphabet.

column.name: USE_DICTIONARY_WORDS
column.description: Use dictionary words

column.name: CASE_SENSITIVE_OPTION
column.description: 0-MIXED/1-Lower/2-Upper

column.name: EXCLUDE_TEXT
column.description: Numeral Required

column.name: FORMAT_ID
column.description: Id for the attributes

column.name: FORMAT_TYPE
column.description: O-Normal type/1-advanced type

column.name: REMOVE_UMLAUTS
column.description: Boolean value to remove umlauts from the format value or not

column.name: TRIM_SPACES_DOTS
column.description: Boolean value to remove unwanted spaces and dots

column.name: REMOVE_CHARACTERS
column.description: Removal characters

column.name: UMLAUT_ID
column.description: Unique Id

table.name: ADSTemplateFormatDefaultSettings
table.description: Contains the Default formats selected by the user
